name: My Rocket Chicken Pet
description:
Oh no! Your rocket chicken pet accidentally got stuck in a volcano! Now itt's up to her to leave, trying to escape the rising lava and avoiding the enemies.

This game was made in less than 48 hours by _s_e_r_ and me, for the Mizjam 1, where everyone used the same art kit. 

HOW THE GAME WORKS

When you propel the rocket, you have a limited amount of "fuel", which recharges when you touch the ground. If the "fuel" runs out mid air, you'll become a chicken and fall.  If you hit and break a breakable wall (which have a slight yellow color) or an enemy while propelling the rocket, you'll get all of your "fuel" back.

CONTROLS

A/D Keys: Move Left and Right - Control rocket's direction

SPACEBAR: Jump

Left Mouse Button: Propel rocket

ASSETS USED IN THE GAME

  • https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle : Abstraction - Ludum Dare 30 (Track #7)
